Shop.OfflineBoost12hDescription: Collects offline bonus for next 12 hours. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost24hDescription: Collects offline bonus for next 24 hours. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost48hDescription: Collects offline bonus for next 48 hours. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost72hDescription: Collects offline bonus for next 72 hours. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost168hDescription: Collects offline bonus for next 168 hours. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost12hRewardDescription: Collects +50% bonus on your rewards for next 12 hours. Can be added with an offline boost. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost24hRewardDescription: Collects +50% bonus on your rewards for the next 24 hours. Can be added with an offline boost. Works 1 time.
Shop.OfflineBoost168hRewardDescription: Collects +50% bonus on your rewards for the next 168 hours. Can be added with an offline boost. Works 1 time.

Shop.ClassicJokerDescription: The original joker with timeless tricks, unlocked at level 1.
Shop.ApprenticeDescription: A beginner learning the art of humor and skill, unlocked at level 2.
Shop.JesterDescription: A playful entertainer bringing joy and mischief, unlocked at level 3.
Shop.TricksterDescription: A clever prankster always ready with a cunning surprise, unlocked at level 4.
Shop.ClownDescription: A funny character spreading laughter and chaos, unlocked at level 5.
Shop.CyberArmorDescription: A high-tech warrior with enhanced protection, unlocked at level 6.
Shop.CyborgDescription: A futuristic hybrid with advanced technology, unlocked at level 7.
Shop.MastermindDescription: A brilliant strategist always one step ahead, unlocked at level 8.
Shop.SorcererDescription: A powerful wielder of arcane magic, unlocking incredible spells at level 9.
Shop.MagicianDescription: A master of illusions and dazzling tricks, unlocked at level 10.
Shop.LuckyDescription: An expert in blockchain and digital wealth, unlocked at level 11.
Shop.PresidentDescription: The ultimate leader commanding respect and authority, unlocked at level 12.
Shop.BatmanDescription: JOK blends mystery and pranks in the Dark Knight’s suit—JokInTheBox’s hero! 🎩 🦇 ✨
Shop.CatDescription: JOK prowls in feline style, whiskers and tail ready for playful mischief! 🎩 🐾 ✨
Shop.DarthVaderDescription: JOK embraces the dark side, helmet on, pranks unstoppable—join his fun empire! 🎩 🌌✨
Shop.HulkDescription: JOK smashes boredom with green muscles and epic jokes—HULK LAUGH! 🎩 💥 🟢
Shop.IronmanDescription: JOK suits up in high-tech armor, blending genius and mischief! 🎩 🛡 ✨
Shop.LuffyDescription: JOK dons Luffy’s straw hat, ready to set sail for endless fun! 🎩 🏴☠ ✨
Shop.MickeyMouseDescription: JOK rocks Mickey ears, red shorts, and his sly grin—pure fun and mischief! 🎩 🐭 ✨
Shop.NarutoDescription: JOK sports Naruto’s headband and orange jumpsuit, blending ninja skills with pranks! 🎩 🍥 ✨
Shop.HarleyDescription: Espiègle, imprévisible et prête à semer le chaos avec style !
Shop.CyborgHarleyDescription: Un mélange explosif de malice et de haute technologie, prêt à pirater le plaisir ! 🎩
Shop.PikachuDescription: JOK sparks excitement with Pikachu’s look—get ready for shocking laughs! 🎩 ⚡ 🐭
Shop.SonGokuDescription: JOK powers up in Goku’s gi, spiky hair, and a cheeky grin—Super Saiyan fun! 🎩 🌀 🔥
Shop.SpidermanDescription: JOK swings in with Spidey’s suit and a mischievous twist—get caught in his web of fun! 🎩 🕸✨
Shop.SupermanDescription: JOK dons the iconic cape, faster than a joke, stronger than a pun! 🎩 🦸 ✨
Shop.ThorDescription: JOK wields Mjolnir, summoning storms of laughter with every strike! 🎩 ⚡ 🔨
Shop.DesertedCityDescription: A hauntingly quiet city ready for exploration, unlocked at level 1.
Shop.LearningRoomDescription: A quiet space for gaining knowledge and skills, unlocked at level 2.
Shop.JesterCastleDescription: A playful castle brimming with humor and surprises, unlocked at level 3.
Shop.MessyHouseDescription: A cluttered house with a charm of its own, unlocked at level 4.
Shop.CircusDescription: A vibrant circus with dazzling performances and fun, unlocked at level 5.
Shop.PranksterCityDescription: A lively, chaotic city full of jokes and surprises, unlocked at level 6.
Shop.EnchantedForestDescription: A magical forest filled with wonder and hidden secrets, unlocked at level 7.
Shop.TradingRoomDescription: A sophisticated hub for mastering trades and deals, unlocked at level 8.
Shop.SorcererHouseDescription: A mystical dwelling filled with magical artifacts, unlocked at level 9.
Shop.MagicCastleDescription: A sparkling fortress of enchantment and mystery, unlocked at level 10.
Shop.NewYorkBasicDescription: The vibrant city that never sleeps, unlocked at level 11.
Shop.MasterCastleDescription: An imposing castle of grandeur and power, unlocked at level 12.
Shop.AfricanSavannahDescription: A sprawling savannah with iconic wildlife and golden plains.
Shop.BeautifulBeachDescription: A picturesque beach with turquoise waters and serene vibes.
Shop.BigTempleDescription: A colossal temple exuding grandeur and ancient mystery.
Shop.BlackHouseDescription: A dark, mysterious house hiding secrets within its walls.
Shop.BlockchainRoomDescription: A futuristic room dedicated to blockchain technology and innovation.
Shop.BotanicalGardenDescription: A lush garden bursting with vibrant flowers and greenery.
Shop.CasinoDescription: A glitzy casino buzzing with games, lights, and high stakes.
Shop.ChemistryLabDescription: A high-tech lab filled with bubbling beakers and scientific tools.
Shop.CocktailBarDescription: A lively bar with exotic drinks and vibrant nightlife.
Shop.DesertDescription: An expansive desert with endless dunes under a blazing sun.
Shop.DesertedBeachDescription: A tranquil beach with golden sands and gentle waves.
Shop.EntranceToTheTempleDescription: A grand temple entrance welcoming adventurers and seekers.
Shop.GateOfTheNightDescription: An eerie gateway that opens into the mystical darkness.
Shop.IndianTempleDescription: A majestic temple showcasing rich Indian culture and heritage.
Shop.JapanDescription: A serene scene of traditional temples and cherry blossoms.
Shop.LasVegasDescription: The dazzling city of entertainment, casinos, and neon lights.
Shop.MagicCityDescription: A fantastical city brimming with glowing lights and spells.
Shop.ManorDescription: A sprawling estate surrounded by mystery and elegance.
Shop.MarioPalaceDescription: A whimsical palace with colorful, game-inspired designs.
Shop.MysteriousForestDescription: An enchanting woodland cloaked in mist and hidden secrets.
Shop.NewYorkDescription: The city that never sleeps with skyscrapers and vibrant streets.
Shop.OldMarketDescription: A bustling, vintage market filled with charm and tradition.
Shop.ParisDescription: The iconic city of lights featuring the Eiffel Tower and timeless romance.
Shop.RoyalHouseDescription: A grand palace with regal architecture and majestic charm.
Shop.SpaceDescription: A vast, starry cosmos with planets and a mysterious void.
Shop.StarWarsDescription: A futuristic galaxy filled with epic starships and intergalactic battles.

Airdrop.title: AIRDROP
Airdrop.rewards: You are already registered for the rewards! Start playing and win even more! 🌟🔥
Airdrop.airdropInfo: Airdrops are distributed randomly to eligible users, however you can increase your chances of being drawn based on our various criteria.

content.title: 🪂 Big Airdrops drop every quarter! 🎉
content.description: 💰 But surprise Airdrops can happen anytime! Thanks to our partner ad revenues, we redistribute extra rewards every month!
content.benefit1: 👉 “Earn multiple airdrops every quarter just by being active!”
content.benefit2: 👉 “Boost your earnings—Upgrade your JOKer and complete quests!”
content.benefit3: 👉 “Connect your Telegram wallet now and secure your next reward!”

AirdropStartPopup.description: To register for all future airdrops, we need to verify your wallet address. Connect your Telegram wallet in your profile and validate it with a transaction.
AirdropStartPopup.makeTransaction: Make a TON transaction and register for future airdrops.
AirdropStartPopup.check: Check and register for the future airdrop

Intro1.language: Choose the Language to get started
Intro1.text2: ✅ Boost your JOKer, grow your passive income! 🚀
Intro1.text3: ✅ Collect your rewards in $TON each month 🎁
